title: 88/128/EEC: Council Decision of 7 March 1988 giving a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) for the financial year 1986
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 7 March 1988
giving a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) for the financial year 1986
(88/128/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Council shall close the revenue and expenditure accounts of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) as at 31 December 1986 as follows:
- revenue: at the sum of 896 802 086,22 ECU,
- expenditure (payments): at the sum of 885 108 571,17 ECU.
The Council hereby gives a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) for the financial year 1986.
